Posts.Content: tilsgirl wrote: I am new here.   I was just at the doctor Monday.  I definitely have a lump in my right armpit - about 1/2" in size.  My doctor says it feels "cystic" because it is smooth and moveable.  It also seems to have grown in size in just a week or two, although I've had this nagging suspicion that is was there since last summer.  I'm 9 weeks preganct.  They are sending me for an ultrasound.  If they can't determine it to be a cyst from that, I will also have to do a mammogram.  I'm concerned about the risks to the baby.  Also, can they definitively diagnsis "cyst" from an ultrasound alone?  Also, they couldn't get me an appointment for 3 weeks.  Is it okay to wait so long?  It's driving me crazy . . . My mother had breast cancer.  She is 5 years cancer-free now.      Diagnosis: 2/11/2010, IDC, Stage II, Grade 3, lymph nodes +, ER+/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nervous - Pregnant with a Lump tilsgirl Lea32
